name: WordPlay
description:
WordPlay is an action-typing game, where you have to type as fast as you can, avoiding incoming danger to succeed.

Arcade Mode

Score-based game mode. Type as fast as you can without making typos.

Modding

Turn any text into a level, using your favourite text editor. You can find comprehensive tutorial in Levels/Modding Info.txt

Physics-Based User Interface

Yeah, this one won't sound less dumb, even if I'll try to explain it.
